column5: I'm just tossing this out there...would any of the Pro's out there be willing to consider going to a cub scout meeting in the Barrie area, say, Sept/Oct to do a talk on fishing with the goal of A: possibly introducing the sport and B: helping young cub scouts obtain their fishing badge?  Thanks Maureen
if you don't get anyone on this site contact Barrie Bassmasters, I will be they would love to do it  http://www.barriebassmasters.org/
You dont need PROS Mo. It,s fishing and a fun way to spend a day.  I would be more then happy to help and just talk to the kids ABOUT FISHINGand the fun that goes with it..

Thanks guys, and you're right, I am helping my friends boys work on their badges this summer and thought it would be cool if something could be set up for the rest of the kids.   My friend is going to get in touch with one of the group leaders and see what they think...I think it would be a blast.  Maureen
If it wasn't 3+ hours away I would do it for sure
Maureen.. see Kickingfrogs post... learn to fish this weekend in Barrie..
A great day for the kids,

I'm sure it would, you're one as well are you?  I lost my Woggle, Scarf and Beads on one of my many moves  The Pro idea was more for the "cool" factor, but lots of good ideas here, and I will see what the group wants to do and go from there. Nothing will happend until Sept. anyway, but I thought of it today and decided to see what the response would be.  I'm srue the leaders and kids will have a great time no matter who shows up  Thanks again Maureen
